replies.body: Will _Odyssey_ skins remain available for purchase after the event ends?

All skins will remain available except Odyssey Ziggs, which will become Legacy on the 25th of September.
But if you can somehow beat the "Planetary Legends" mission you can earn an Odyssey Ziggs skins shard, and the game mode will remain available to play until 5PM AEST on Oct 10th.
Yo, what happened to the Odyssey Sona emote that was on the PBE?
Heya Glori0us. That emote is exclusive to streamer giveaways. A bunch have been given away already but not all streamers have used their allocation up yet.
